intro: If you are a guitarist, you will understand the predicament of losing a pick while playing. This is the simplest hack you will ever see. It is effective as it increases your grip exponentially and requires almost no effort.
intro_items: If you are a guitarist, you will understand the predicament of losing a pick while playing. This is the simplest hack you will ever see. It is effective as it increases your grip exponentially and requires almost no effort.
materiaux:
Supplies
  • You will require guitar picks. (If you are like me, you have many)
  • Also, a single hole punch is required. ( The kind you find in a stationery store- or better yet, one designed for metal.)

etapes.html:
1. Step 1: PUNCH

Ã‰tapes :

  1. Collect all your picks and simply punch a hole in the middle of the wide end of each. When you play your guitar, you will find your grip is greatly increased due to skin to skin contact through the hole.
